name: Workshop: Dahlias! {SOLD OUT}
description:
Come to the farm and enjoy a brief tour of the gardens, sip a cool beverage and have fun with friends while we guide you through a low-stress way to create a lovely arrangement with dahlias from our farm. With over 20 varieties in bloom this year, these show-stoppers are one of our favorites.

All flowers and supplies are provided, along with tasty snacks & drinks. 

September 8, 2012 - 2-4pm

name: Workshop: English Roses {SOLD OUT}
description:
Come to the farm and enjoy a brief tour of the gardens, sip a cool beverage and have fun with friends while we guide you through a low-stress way to create a lovely arrangement with one of the major stars of our garden, our English roses. The beauty & fragrance of these beauties will take your breath away. In addition to the roses, we'll have buckets full of dahlias, berries and many other early fall crops for designing.

All flowers and supplies are provided, along with tasty snacks & drinks. 

September 29, 2012 - 2pm-4pm

name: Workshop: Autumn Harvest {SOLD OUT}
description:
Come to the farm and enjoy a brief tour of the gardens, sip a cool beverage and have fun with friends while we guide you through a low-stress way to create a lush arrangement with the fall bounty from the gardens. This magical season is one of our favorites, full of vibrant color and texture and beautiful mild weather. As an extra dose of fun, we will also be creating a hand-tied bouquet in this class!

All flowers and supplies are provided, along with tasty snacks & drinks. 

October 13, 2012 - 2pm-4pm
